instruction: Compose a tweet of 140 characters that announces an upcoming sports event.
input: Yokohama DeNA BayStars vs SoftBank Hawks on April 7th, 2021.
output: Sports fans, join us on April 7th to cheer for the Yokohama DeNA BayStars and SoftBank Hawks! Who will win? #SportsNight #YokohamaBayStars #SoftBankHawks
